subject: Olympic Games (2008)
European Sovereign Debt Crisis (2010- )
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Greece has scrapped extra financing for training, athletes say aid they are supposed to receive is frequently late, and many training centers have fallen into disrepair or closed.
snippet: Greece has scrapped extra financing for training, athletes say aid they are supposed to receive is frequently late, and many training centers have fallen into disrepair or closed.
